author: andschwa
body: This was strange. On Windows, the same build of .NET Core _does not_ require either; however the build of .NET Core for Linux _does_ require these libraries. It is strange, but it is so. Libraries have been added to monad ext. VSO create date - 10/8/2015 13:59:00     VSO closed date - 10/13/2015 10:08:00
title: Review System.Reflection.Metadata and System.Collections.Immutable with CoreFX team
